title: on me by section 8(3) of the Private Security Services (Amendment) Act 2021
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Private Security Services (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Private Security Services (Amendment) 

Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited private security service (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2023

title: on me by section 8(3) of the Private Security Services (Amendment) Act 2021
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Private Security Services (Amendment) Act 2021 
(No. 19 of 2021) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 2(1)(a) (except insofar as it is already in operation); 

(b) 

section 2(1)(b). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 March, 2023. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [139] 3
